name: AMPATH POC Pediatric Return Form v1.8

required.message: Patient visit marked as unscheduled. Please provide the scheduled date.

questions.label: What is the patient's NHIF status?
questions.questionInfo: Indicate if the patient has been remitting monthly contributions towards the NHIF medical cover.

questions.label: What other insurance do you have?
questions.questionInfo: Indicate if the patient has another medical cover.

validators.message: This form should only be used for HIV+ patients. Please enroll the patient in the HEI Program and use the HEI forms for exposed patients

questions.label: Has the child been assessed for OVC care?

questions.label: Have you been vaccinated for HPV?

validators.message: Please indicate dose

questions.label: Would you like to be vaccinated now?
If no,why do you not attend school:

answers.label: To get money or food on the street

questions.label: In the past three months has anyone punched, slapped, kicked, bite you or caused you any type of physical harm?
questions.questionInfo: Anyone can include your partner, a family member, friend, neighbor, client, stranger, supervisor, colleague, police officer or other persons.

questions.label: In the past three months has anyone insulted you, ignored you, yelled at you, or made you feel ashamed or bad about yourself?
questions.questionInfo: as with the previous question, 'anyone' can include your partner, a family member, friend, neighbor, client, stranger, supervisor, colleague, police officer or other persons.

questions.label: In the past three months has anyone forced you to have sex or perform any sexual act, touched you sexually in any way that you did not want?
questions.questionInfo: As with the previous question, 'anyone' can include your partner, a family member, friend, neighbor, client, stranger, supervisor, colleague
